articles.title: TikTok and Universal Music Group end feud with new agreement - The Verge

articles.title: Mavs' Luka Doncic dominates Game 5 despite illness, knee injury - ESPN
articles.description: Despite playing through illness and a sprained knee, Luka Doncic put up 35 points, 7 rebounds and 10 assists to lead the Mavs to victory in a pivotal Game 5 against the Clippers on Wednesday night.
articles.content: LOS ANGELES -- Dallas Mavericks superstar Luka Doncic got an early start on his postgame treatment Wednesday night, wrapping a large bag of ice around his sprained right knee midway through the fourt… [+3145 chars]

articles.title: Georgia rocked by clashes over 'foreign agent' bill - BBC.com
articles.description: Riot police in Georgia fire tear gas and water cannon into crowds protesting at a controversial bill.

articles.title: May 1, 2024 - US campus protests - CNN
articles.description: Police are cracking down on protests against Israel's bombardment of Gaza at campuses across the US.
